org.icij.datashare.text.nlp

Interface NlpPipeline

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNlpPipeline, CoreNlpPipeline, GateNlpPipeline, IxaNlpPipeline, MitieNlpPipeline, OpenNlpPipeline

    public interface NlpPipeline
    Extract tokens, sentences, parts-of-speech or named entities from text Created by julien on 4/4/16.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static Optional<NlpPipeline> create(NlpPipeline.Type type,
                                    Properties properties)
        Instantiate a concrete NlpPipeline reflectively with a NlpPipeline.Type enum value
        Parameters:
        type - the NlpPipeline.Type enum value denoting a NlpPipeline implementation
        properties - the NlpPipeline settings as Properties
        Returns:
        the corresponding NlpPipeline implementation instance if succeeded; empty Optional otherwise
        See Also:
        NlpPipeline.Type, EnumTypeToken, NlpPipeline.Property

      • supports

        boolean supports(NlpStage stage,
                 Language language)
        Is stage supported for language?
        Parameters:
        stage - the stage to test for support
        language - the language on which stage is tested
        Returns:
        true if stage supports language; false otherwise
